title: Calgary Family Naturopathic Medicine I Dr. Allissa Gaul ND
description: Resolve your health issues at Resonance Wellness, using effective Naturopathic Medicine, with one of the most experienced Naturopathic Doctors in Calgary.
cleaned_text: Looking for Helping Dr. Mom Courses? Helping Dr. Mom has LAUNCHED! Visit the online course page at [helpingdrmom.com](http://helpingdrmom.com)! [Explore the Whole Life Medicine Resource Site](http://whole-life-medicine.com). A plethora of handouts on Conditions, Diet Therapies, Nutrients, Homeopathy, Herbal Medicines, Product Information sheets, further info about Lab Testing, etc! Our Services: COMPREHENSIVE NATUROPATHIC CARE for adults and children - Functional Family Medicine - Prevention & Wellness - Pediatric Care - 24h pager - Solutions to Chronic Illness - Therapies for Pain - Anthroposophic Medicine - Metabolic Typing - Specialized Lab Testing - Natural Solutions for Common Health Complaints Free Health Record System [Sign up and get your Health Record! ](http://www.wlm-learning.com) Keep all your records in one place and get the best out of all your providers. Opening Hours: Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Saturday Sunday 11:00am - 6:00pm 9:00 am - 5:00pm 9:00 am - 5:00pm 9:00 am - 5:00pm 9:00 am - 5:00pm CLOSED CLOSED For Returning Patients Or enter your info and we'll email you information about our practice.
